snippet: The new Acura RDX is a more tightly tailored machine than the previous model and is a better, easier-going instrument of family utility. A V-6 also replaces the old turbo 4-cylinder.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of 2013 Acura RDX compact crossover.
lead_paragraph: The new Acura RDX is a more tightly tailored machine than the previous model and is a better, easier-going instrument of family utility. A V-6 also replaces the old turbo 4-cylinder.

headline.seo: Now Less Interesting, and All the Better for It

headline.print_headline: Now Less Interesting, And All the Better for It
